summary: During preflight checks, the deuterium injector feed shows inconsistent pressure readings.

answers.text: Purge the injector assembly and perform manual pressure equalization.
answers.details: Corrects flow irregularity at the source; adheres to Starfleet procedural thoroughness.

answers.text: Compensate electronically with higher injector pulse rates.
answers.details: Competent temporary solution; safe but does not address the root hardware issue fully.

answers.text: Proceed to launch; minor fluctuations are within margin.
answers.details: Acceptable short-term; less proactive and slightly riskier than manual correction.
